messages.title: This is the most important election in a generation.
messages.content: On December 12th I am asking you to place your trust in me again to represent you in Parliament.

messages.title: I voted against triggering Article 50.
messages.content: I've voted against all forms of Brexit in Parliament repeatedly, and I always will.

messages.title: Remember, there is nothing 'tactical' about voting against a remainer and lifelong local.
messages.content: Voting for the Lib Dems, or any other party, risks handing Ealing Central and Acton back to the Tories. Four years ago Labour won by only 274 votes.

messages.title: I am the only remain candidate who can beat the Tories and their plans for a hard Brexit.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Voting for the Lib Dems, or any other party, risks handing Ealing Central and Acton back to the Tories. Four years ago Labour won by only 274 votes.

issues.brexitEurope: I've voted against all forms of Brexit in Parliament repeatedly, and I always will.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am the only remain candidate who can beat the Tories and their plans for a hard Brexit.

images.caption: Image of Rupa Huq with the Houses of Parliament in the background.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Promoted by Phil Kemball on behalf of Rupa Huq, both at 1 Church Road, W3 8PP. Printed by SoloPress, 9 Stock Road, Southend-on-Sea SS2 5QF.
